descriptionMarkdown:
Hi there, it's my first post here.

I read tons of posts about kovarex setups but they all seemed super complicated to me. So here is my try on a vanilla, single centrifuge (can possibly easily be expanded with multiple centrifuges), belt-only kovarex setup. Let me know what you think. I'm happy about any feedback.

Explanation:

There are two loops around the centrifuge: the inner loop holds the U-235, the outer loop feeds U-238. The 2 U-238 from the process output are fed to the outer loop via the prioritized splitter at the bottom right. Any more needed U-238 is fed from the blue chest at the left . The blue chest beneath the centrifuge is just needed to start the whole thing (feed the initial 40 U-235 and can be deleted after). The inner loop will fill with U-235 and all excess U-235 will then sum up in the chest on the right (can be converted to red chest).
title: Vanilla, Single Centrifuge, Belt-only, Kovarex Setup
